name: ArboviralDiseaseOtherTestsForArbovirusOtherIgMAntibody
title: Arboviral Disease [Other] (Tests for Arbovirus [Other] IgM Antibody)
description: Arboviral Disease [Other] includes the following diseases: • Alkhurma virus disease • Barmah Forest virus disease • Bourbon virus disease • Heartland virus disease • Highlands J virus disease • Kyasanur Forest virus disease • Mayaro virus disease • Murray Valley encephalitis virus disease • O'nyong-nyong virus disease • Oropouche virus disease • Cache Valley Fever virus disease • Rocio virus disease • Ross River virus disease • Sindbis virus disease • Tahyna virus disease • Toscana virus disease • Usutu virus disease • Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus disease, neuroinvasive and non-neuroinvasive • Flavivirus disease, not otherwise specified • Other arboviral disease, not otherwise specified
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of selected arbovirus IgM antibodies.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Generic arboviral disease and those conditions listed in the Notes section),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions not listed in Notes section)
